caption.center: Leota SLINKER, Appellant v. COMMONWEALTH of Kentucky, Appellee.

opinion.posture: Appeal from Circuit Court, Hardin County; Charles E. Whittle, Special Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Haynes Carter, J. E. Wise, Elizabethtown, for appellant.
J. D. Buckman, Jr., Atty. Gen., William F. Simpson, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
opinion.opinion_text: This is a motion for an appeal from a judgment of the Hardin Circuit Court convicting appellant of the offense of selling alcoholic beverages in local option territory. Her punishment was fixed at a fine of $60 and confinement in jail for a period of 45 days.Page 746
